snippet: The attacks in Hilla, in southern Iraq, and Baghdad, the capital, also wounded at least 70 people, the police said.
abstract: Series of bombings in Iraq on Thursday kills at least 30 people and wounds 70.
lead_paragraph: The attacks in Hilla, in southern Iraq, and Baghdad, the capital, also wounded at least 70 people, the police said.

headline.main: Bombings Kill at Least 30 in Iraq
headline.print_headline: Iraq: Bombings Kill at Least 30 People
